level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any section or provision of this subchapter is held to be unconstitutional or invalid, such unconstitutionality or invalidity shall not affect the remaining sections or provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-51
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-51, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 24-451.
